snippet: The pianist Fred Hersch and his bassist, John Hébert, and drummer, Eric McPherson, have achieved a compatibility and a sense of themselves as a trio.
abstract: Nate Chinen reviews performance by the Fred Hersch Trio at the Village Vanguard.
lead_paragraph: The pianist Fred Hersch and his bassist, John Hébert, and drummer, Eric McPherson, have achieved a compatibility and a sense of themselves as a trio.

headline.seo: Fred Hersch Trio, Live and Recorded, at the Village Vanguard
headline.main: Embracing the Piano and the Material
headline.print_headline: Embracing the Piano and the Material
